sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Header.css'; const Header = ({ user, onLogout, onToggleSidebar }) => { const [showUserMenu, setShowUserMenu] = useState(false); const formatGreeting = () => { const hour = new Date().getHours(); if (hour < 12) return 'Good morning'; if (hour < 17) return 'Good afternoon'; return 'Good evening'; }; return (

Farm Management Dashboard

{formatGreeting()}, {user?.name || 'Farmer'}!

setShowUserMenu(!showUserMenu)}>
{user?.name?.charAt(0) || 'U'}
{user?.name || 'User'} {user?.role || 'Farmer'}
{showUserMenu && (
Profile
Settings
Logout
)}
); }; export default Header;
